definition: servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor

sentences.english: Humanity is still to groan under the slavery of ornament.
sentences.chinese: 人類還要在裝飾面前奴顏婢膝。

sentences.english: Spend as little time on the means as possible consistent with achieving the end. Only idiots live to work.
sentences.chinese: 但得明瞭，無做到在奴顏婢膝的同時又能出自我。
